aka: Trip to the World of the Unknown

director.name: 罗尔夫·奥尔森 Rolf Olsen

trans_title: Trip to the World of the Unknown
introduction: The Omen and "The Exorcist" were fun, ... but are you ready for the real thing?THE WORLD'S GREATEST MASTERS OF THE OCCULT DEMONSTRATE THEIR SUPERPOWERS IN A MIND SHATTERING DISPLAY OF PSYCHIC PHENOMENA AND THE SUPERNATURAL. This film documents all forms of occult phenomena, faith healing and exorcism. The film enters the no-mans land of the psychic. It makes a fresh attempt to explain the unexplained and searches for new connections between life and time, death and eternity, which will make the unthinkable possible, and the incredible credible.
